post.body: Thx 4 following me; I'm flattered! Looking 4wd 2 learning more about you & seeing ur merchandise. I prob'ly need/want some! :)
Great job 2dy Rick. Better every day! Next stop: OUR news story requests??? (LOL but serious.) Who else @ CNN tweets on air?
If politicians approached "the people's" involvement the way u do we'd be less disenfranchised & govt might work!
Do you feel it's a problem that it was a black man who spoke on race in this way? Why isn't it BETTER that it WAS a black man?
That speech was good in regards 2 race b/c race was the elephant in the room but no1 wanted 2 hear NEGATIVE rhetoric.
The speech was great & deff helped, but there were so many more soundbites & things about Obama that led him to his success.
Didn't Israel back out of Gaza once b4 only 2 have Hamas continue to bomb & terrorize Israel?
What is US govt's reaction 2 Hamas leader's death? US encouraged voting but ignores results. Unexplainable.
how's the knee mr. Sanchez?
Great Job, Bill! Just read the follow up. Still hope 2 speak w/u 1 on 1. Msg when able. Keep up the good work!!
Why are American's so stunned? If anyone lobbed rockets in2 the US, we'd be in their air & on their grounds already!
Just set up my Blog site. I'm so excited - and NERVOUS! Thank you Bil, for the advice!
Anticipating interview w/Michelle Obama on The Situation Room on CNN!
Yea I think they will cause they don't want to appear less than determined. Not smartest move israel could make though. Hamas leader dea ...
Happy new year everyone!
Blago's appointment overshadows middle east war news? Your thoughts??
FOLLOW BILL BROWNING
Pondering no subpoenas for obama's picks!
I need a day off after my day off!
Heading for a shower & prep b4 heading out to do some "fast" shopping!
